title: UNIVERSITE EUROPEENNE / Dr. Marco Paret
description:
Our new training is still open for registrations! From October 7 to 16, 2021, in Rome, 10 days of intense training, level 1 and level 2, each level of 5 days, possibility of registration at one or two levels, program adapted to all levels. For more information write to us at www.marcoparet.com/contact. 
Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Check out some other videos with our students  on our channel:
https://youtu.be/xwy0mry12SM
https://youtu.be/sKXeWdz15cQ

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
https://www.youtube.com/user/neurolinguistic 

Join our Italian channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/pnlcoaching 

For any further information, please contact us at:

Get our FREE course at:
